BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC
BasicDescription.Synopsis: This is CBBC. Programmes begin at 7.00am.

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover kids target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind. Little 'miracles' turn to big 'miracles' in today's show.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Xchange
BasicDescription.Synopsis: If you're after celebrities, comedy or chat, this is the show for you. Includes Newsround updates.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: Tel: 0845 900 2222 (local rate) - remember to get permission.

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy, where the race for the prize is down to the last few talented hopefuls.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Canary Row/Dime To Retire/Hare Trimmed: A triple bill of wacky antics starring Sylvester and Tweety, Porky Pig, Bugs Bunny and Yosemite Sam.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Megamaths
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Measure. The King's New Clothes: The importance of using appropriate units of measurement is shown when the King of Spades orders the Ace tailors to change their measurements.

BasicDescription.Title: The Experimenter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Electricity And Magnetism. What's The Attraction? Sarah's recycling project gets XP interested in magnets.

BasicDescription.Title: Look And Read
BasicDescription.Synopsis: ZZaap And The Word Master. The Castle Of Gloom: Two children travel through a computer game in an underground world, solving word clues. Josie and Peter meet Sir Clifford Clank and Sheherezade.

BasicDescription.Title: Primary History
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Tudor Life. Homes - A Yeoman's Story: A look at how homes differed from ours 450 years ago. What did they look like? What materials were they made from? How were they furnished?

BasicDescription.Title: Landmarks
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] Using The Land. Changing Industry: A look at change in industry in two different areas, Barrow-In-Furness and Appleby-In-Westmoreland.

BasicDescription.Title: Zig Zag
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 7-9] Art. Colour: Artists and children get creative as they explore colour in the natural world.

BasicDescription.Title: Science Zone
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 9-11] People. Horses For Courses: Steve Johnson's challenge is to help with the birth of a foal. The Micro Zone features the development of the human baby from fertilisation to birth.

BasicDescription.Title: Hallo Aus Berlin
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-13] Freizeit (Free Time): Miriam goes horse riding, Jessica has a ballet class, Thomas and Daniel go shopping for CDs and Arno stays in bed as long as he can.

BasicDescription.Title: Belief File
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-14] Islam. The Qur'An: A look at the importance and meaning of the Qur'an to Muslims, along with the influences it had on the history of Islam.

BasicDescription.Title: Newsround
BasicDescription.Synopsis: CBBC joins the Newsround team who will be keeping you up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

BasicDescription.Title: History File
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 14-16] Soviet Communism And The Cold War. Bolshevik Russia: The story of Clare Sheridan, a British aristocrat who travelled to Moscow in 1920 and kept a diary recording what she found.

BasicDescription.Title: Techno
BasicDescription.Synopsis: [Age 11-14] Designers. Mass Production: A look at an innovative German design company which produces stylish household products in plastic using injection moulding.

BasicDescription.Title: Blue Peter
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Catch up with the magazine programme with celebrity guests, music, sport, food, and a whole lot more.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Julia Jekyll And Harriet Hyde
BasicDescription.Synopsis: It's Mr Rocket's tenth anniversary at the Academy and his mother is planning a surprise party.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Monster Cafe
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Central Heating: When the Baroness cuts of the heating in the cafï¿½ as a cost cutting exercise, Frankie's in trouble; the cold causes her battery pack to malfunction. Can her friends save her?
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Simon And The Witch
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Comedy drama based on Margaret Stuart Barry's book. The Witch's sister,Tombola,arrives for a visit with some pet snakes.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: The Story Of Tracy Beaker
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Tracy becomes embroiled in a game of dares with Justine. Meanwhile, a writer visits the Dumping Ground, and Tracy is keen to make a big impression.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Animadness
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A bumper package of cartoon fun, featuring classic episodes of Looney Tunes, plus double helpings of Cramp Twins and Taz-Mania.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Stitch Up
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A group of undercover kids target members of the public in this practical joke whirlwind of a show. A Saturday worker at a chemist endures a day she'll never forget in today's Big Stitch Up.
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: Looney Tunes
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Canned Fued: Sylvester gets locked in the house while his owners are on holiday. The only food is in cans, and the only can opener is in the hands of a very mischievous mouse...
BasicDescription.PromotionalInformation: SMS: 07736 22 22 00 - text CBBC Studio (usual rates apply)

BasicDescription.Title: CBBC At The Fame Academy
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Get the latest from the Fame Academy, where the race for the prize is down to the last few talented hopefuls.

BasicDescription.Title: Xchange
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The XChange gang are back with more celebs, games and chat.

BasicDescription.Title: Grange Hill
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Hankin orders a spider hunt while Shannon spins a web of lies.

BasicDescription.Title: This Is CBBC!
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Join the CBBC crew for all your favourite programmes, plus loads more! Tune into CBBC everyday from 7.00am to 7.00pm.
